text: Auguste Marchais (4 October 1872 - 16 November 1952) was a French track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France, his birthplace. Marchais competed in the marathon. He was one of six runners to not finish the marathon. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. Available electronically at . * * French Olympians F-P Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of France Category:French male long- distance runners Category:French male marathon runners Category:Sportspeople from Paris Category:1872 births Category:1952 deaths
title: Auguste Marchais
